name: Advanced Deck
description: Powerful cards unlocked through career progression. Higher cost, higher impact.
unlockRequirement: Complete case-001 or reach Senior Associate rank

cards.name: Expert Rebuttal
cards.description: Your expert takes the stand to dismantle their expert. Science versus science â€” let the jury decide who's more convincing.
cards.effectDescription: Counters opponent's expert testimony. Reverses up to 6 points of jury opinion. Grants +3 CP from effective counter-argument.

cards.name: Surprise Witness
cards.description: "The defense calls..." A gasp fills the courtroom. No one expected this. The witness who changes everything.
cards.effectDescription: Introduces a witness not on the original witness list. Massive jury impact (+10) and devastating to opposing witnesses (-25 composure). Judge may limit scope.

cards.name: Sealed Evidence
cards.description: Locked away by court order, unsealed by your motion. What was hidden may be the key to everything.
cards.effectDescription: Powerful evidence that was previously sealed. Strong jury impact (+7) and reveals hidden information about witnesses.

cards.name: Jury Instruction Request
cards.description: "Your Honor, we request a special instruction to the jury regarding..." Frame how they think about the evidence.
cards.effectDescription: Request specific jury instructions that frame evidence in your favor. If judge agrees: jury opinion shift (+5) and judge favor (+2).

cards.name: Change of Venue
cards.description: "Your Honor, we move for a change of venue due to prejudicial media coverage." New location, new jury pool, new possibilities.
cards.effectDescription: If granted: replaces 4 jurors from the pool with new jurors. Reveals full bias information on all new jurors. Extremely rare to be granted.

cards.name: Forensic Animation
cards.description: A 3D reconstruction plays on the courtroom screens. The jury watches the events unfold as the evidence suggests they happened. Seeing is believing.
cards.effectDescription: Visual reconstruction of events based on evidence. High impact on visual learners and emotional jurors (+6). Undermines contradicting witnesses.

cards.name: Cold Case Evidence
cards.description: Evidence from a decades-old case resurfaces, connecting dots no one knew existed. The past has a way of catching up.
cards.effectDescription: Introduces evidence from a related past case. Very strong jury impact (+8). Can reveal patterns of behavior.

cards.name: Plea Bargain Offer
cards.description: "My client is willing to discuss terms." Sometimes the best victory is the one negotiated, not won.
cards.effectDescription: Initiates plea negotiation. Outcome depends on current case strength. Guaranteed resolution but reduced XP. Judge must approve.

cards.name: Witness Protection Deal
cards.description: "In exchange for full and truthful testimony, we can guarantee your safety." Fear makes witnesses lie. Remove the fear.
cards.effectDescription: Grants immunity or protection to a reluctant witness, boosting their composure (+30) and encouraging truthful testimony (+5 jury).

cards.name: Constitutional Challenge
cards.description: "Your Honor, this evidence was obtained in violation of the Fourth Amendment." The Constitution is the ultimate trump card.
cards.effectDescription: Challenge the constitutionality of evidence or procedure. If granted: suppresses up to 3 opponent cards, major jury swing. If denied: significant CP loss.

cards.name: Recall Witness
cards.description: "The defense recalls the witness to the stand." They thought they were done. They were wrong.
cards.effectDescription: Bring back a previously dismissed witness for additional examination. Composure penalty from the surprise (-15). Jury pays attention (+4).

cards.name: Evidence Cascade
cards.description: One piece connects to another connects to another. The evidence tells a story, and you're laying it out chapter by chapter.
cards.effectDescription: Draw 3 cards and play up to 2 evidence cards this turn. Combo bonus (+5) if evidence shares tags.

cards.name: Emotional Closing Appeal
cards.description: "Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, I ask you to look into your hearts..." Logic has its limits. Sometimes you need to reach their souls.
cards.effectDescription: Powerful emotional appeal during closing. Strong impact on emotional jurors (+7). Less effective on analytical jurors. Risky if judge dislikes theatrics.

cards.name: Declare Hostile Witness
cards.description: "Your Honor, I request permission to treat this witness as hostile." Gloves off. Now you can ask the hard questions.
cards.effectDescription: Allows leading questions on your own witness. Opens aggressive examination tactics. Composure pressure (-10) and jury notices the drama (+3).

cards.name: Bombshell Revelation
cards.description: The courtroom falls silent. The evidence is irrefutable. Everything the jury thought they knew just changed. This is the moment that wins or loses the case.
cards.effectDescription: The ultimate evidence play. Massive jury swing (+15), devastating witness impact (-30), and CP gain (+5). Requires specific hidden evidence to play.
